thread.title: A German Coalition of the Losers

author: The Editorial Board
title: A German Coalition of the Losers
text:
German politics is unusual, but the current spectacle of the biggest losers from last year’s election doing a tango to form an unpopular coalition government is something else. The country’s least successful party, the Social Democrats (SPD), is calling the shots on policy—and tearing itself apart anyway.
Recall that Chancellor Angela Merkel’s Christian Democrats (CDU/CSU) and the SPD were the main victims of September’s vote. Mrs. Merkel lost enough seats to make it all but impossible for her to form a government, as voters... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
